pages.text: $(9)Attack Speed$() controls how frequently you can attack. If your attack speed is 2, you can attack twice per second.$(p)Various items can increase your attack speed.
$(9)$(n)Base Value:$() 4$(p)$(9)$(n)Max Value:$() 1024$(p)Note: Weapons will usually specify their own attack speed, ignoring the base value of 4.
